mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_code AS "contractCode", a.contract_name AS "contractName", a.by_project AS "byProject", a.by_company AS "byCompany", a.file_name AS "fileName", a.file_path AS "filePath", a.create_user AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_user AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract( id, contract_code, contract_name, by_project, by_company, file_name, file_path, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contractCode}, #{contractName}, #{byProject}, #{byCompany}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE contract SET contract_code = #{contractCode}, contract_name = #{contractName}, by_project = #{byProject}, by_company = #{byCompany}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath}, create_user = #{createBy.id}, create_time = #{createDate}, update_user = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
